tweets.text:
Fishing licence income is used to protect England's precious waterways, including our fish stocks and habitats. 

Don't risk a fine. Buy your licence at: https://t.co/fx56eQ45pG https://t.co/2OfmRqTsrE

Happy #WorldWaterDay! It's not too late to join today's event with Emily O'Donnell and guest speakers from @EnvAgency @MyNottingham & @stwater. Find out how the 21st century city can meet its resources challenges and what part you can play.
@Papplewick_PS https://t.co/iXKLYjIxkf https://t.co/Ciy7ZqezL1

@stephenbourne2 @ollyandpatch @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgency 1/2 Ive said from when I got involved that its a human rights issue. Peoples right to a private and family life is being affected and therefore breached.
People seen reluctant to go down this road though, because I believe they think it'll take too long.

tweets.text: Lots of people passing @CodyDock really distressed at oil once more flowing down tidal river Lea. Been reported (again) to @EnvAgency. There is increased frequency with this - weekly & sometimes more. Birds nesting, reed bed filthy etc. Hard to get good pics! @LDNWaterkeeper https://t.co/2MJJqrU7vc

@WasteCrimeWatch Thank you for highlighting this. We are at the mercy of Red Industries and the EA - the EA support Red as to do otherwise would admit they are guilty of dereliction of duty in public office!  Allowing  vapour  intrusion into houses at least 2.5 miles away is totally unacceptable!
